entry.title: Oculus and Xbox create VR tie-up
entry.summary: "But streaming XBox One games... is not going to sell Oculus.

entry.title: Will 'Call of Duty: Black Ops 3' Be Held Back By Xbox 360 And PS3?
entry.summary:
Will 'Call of Duty: Black Ops 3' Be Held Back By Xbox 360 And PS3?

"However, we know that there are still some fans that haven't made the transition to the new console hardware, which is why we're happy to share that we're working with developers Beenox and Mercenary Technology on Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3."

entry.title: Woman pleads not guilty to fatally stabbing beau over Xbox
Woman pleads not guilty to fatally stabbing beau over Xbox
entry.summary:
NEWARK, N.J. (AP) - A New Jersey woman accused of fatally stabbing her boyfriend during a dispute over their Xbox console has pleaded not guilty to aggravated manslaughter.

According to police reports, the couple began arguing over Xbox and the dispute turned physical.

entry.title: Fallout 4 is never, ever, ever coming to Xbox 360 or PS3
